title: A Love Song for Always
description: I've spent years hating Tyler Adams.Â I've also envied him, longed for him, and prayed to forget him.He will always be my rebel prince and my childhood rival.Tomorrow, he'll become something new...My husband.And I dare anything in this world to try and break us apart.A Love Song for Always (Rivals #4) is a Tyler and Annie bonus book and should be read following Book 3 of the Rivals trilogy (A Love Song for Dreamers).
author: Piper Lawson
